availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, hotel keeper. West Virginia native. Son of William and Susan Watson Watson. Married to Carry Watson. Father of Samuel Watson. Gardener in Hamilton County, Ohio in 1850. Hotel Keeper in Cincinnati in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton, Green, p. 448B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton, Cincinnati Ward 1, p. 12.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules,Ohio, Hamilton, Cincinnati Ward 1, p. 73B.
